txt.en: Nagli can be found at Khadâsh-gâra.\n\nYou should talk to Nagli.
Nagli set your supper beside you at Khadâsh-gâra.\n\nThe Want-kin have begun their meal. You should share a supper with them.
Instance: The Want-kin
DNT
<rgb=#00ff00>Sit</rgb> on the log beside Nagli at the camp-fire at Khadâsh-gâra
Stórath scoffs and wanders off to his bedroll
It is hard to imagine a finer meal prepared in the wilds of Elderslade
Nagli sits down beside the fire and gestures to a log
Nagli can be found at Khadâsh-gâra.\n\nAfter Stórath expressed his displeasure in hosting you, Nagli and the other Want-kin defended your presence at Khadâsh-gâra. You should talk to Nagli.
Sit on the log beside Nagli at the camp-fire at Khadâsh-gâra
The Want-kin listen closely to your tales of adventure

'Do not let Stórath's words bother you, [placeholder]. I think perhaps the ale has gone to his head!

'I know the others and I were glad to hear your tales of adventure. I have a feeling we've not even heard the half of it, but that's enough for one night. It was a fine evening, and I am glad to have shared it with you.

'It is late. Your adventures with Durin can wait until morning, I think.

'Come, I've prepared a bedroll for you.'
As the wood crackles, the fire's warmth can be felt throughout Khadâsh-gâra
Nagli and Stórath are talking about the tales you told.

'Ah, that warms my bones! Thank you for fetching that firewood, [placeholder].

'It is true enough that you've come to aid Durin in his quest, but what else brought you here to the Slade? Where have your past adventures led you? I know you've told me of your adventures since we parted in Ered Luin, but I think my companions would be just as interested to hear of them!

'What do you say?'
Talk to Nagli
Beside the fire, plates of food have been prepared
Talk to Nagli
Share a hearty supper with the Want-kin at Khadâsh-gâra
'Ah! While you are standing, could you fetch some more wood for the fire?\n\n'It's just over there. But do try to be quiet, Lapis doesn't like to be startled in her sleep!'
Tell Nagli and the Want-kin the <rgb=#00ff00>story</rgb> of your adventures before coming to Elderslade
Nagli can be found at Khadâsh-gâra.\n\nNagli has asked to speak with you. You should talk to Nagli.
Neither Longbeards, Zhélruka, nor Stout-axes, a company of clanless dwarves known only as the Want-kin have made camp in Elderslade.
This will do...
<rgb=#FF0000>You have dropped the logs!</rgb>
A suitable log for sitting can be found beside Nagli at Khadâsh-gâra.\n\nNagli has asked you to join him and the other Want-kin at the camp-fire at Khadâsh-gâra.
Listen to Nagli and the Want-kin
Nagli can be found at Khadâsh-gâra.\n\nYou should follow Nagli.
Firewood can be found at Khadâsh-gâra.\n\nNagli has asked you to fetch some firewood to stoke the fire at Khadâsh-gâra. You should collect the firewood.
Talk to Nagli

'Ah, that warms my bones! Thank you for fetching that firewood, [placeholder].

'It is true enough that you've come to aid Durin in his quest, but what else brought you here to the Slade? Where have your past adventures led you?

'I know my companions and I are eager to hear more about you. What do you say?'
Follow Nagli
The Want-kin begin their supper, and you should too!
Talk to Nagli
You enjoy a fine meal of fish and boar from Elderslade
Collect firewood to stoke the fire at Khadâsh-gâra
Listen to Nagli and Stórath

'Thank you for staying for the night, [placeholder]. You will not regret it!

'We've prepared a fine supper, and it would be our honour to share it with you.

'I've prepared a place for you at the fire. Come!'
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far from the log!</rgb>
The Want-kin are preparing to have supper.
Listen to Nagli and the Want-kin
DNT
Nagli can be found at Khadâsh-gâra.\n\nYou have brought more firewood to the fire at Khadâsh-gâra as Nagli asked. You should talk to Nagli.
Toss the firewood into the fire at Khadâsh-gâra

Nagli can be found at Khadâsh-gâra.

Nagli has asked to hear more tales of your adventures before coming to Elderslade. You should tell Nagli and the Want-kin of your adventures in Middle-earth.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You will need to select Nagli before emoting to advance this quest.</rgb>
'It has been a long day, [placeholder]. Let us take our rest!'
